snippet: It has been reported that the new health insurance law combined with the immigration law passed by the Senate would reward employers for hiring illegal immigrants. But would it?
abstract: It has been reported that the new health insurance law combined with the immigration law passed by the Senate would reward employers for hiring illegal immigrants. But would it?

headline.main: Could Employers Use Immigrants to Avoid the Health Mandate?

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
